00000002 ; patadr, pattern address hex 0100
00000042 ; 0x21 << 1
00000000
00000001
00000002 ; BIAS ON 
0000000C ; 0x06 << 1
00000001
00000001
00000004 ; patclk, 10 ticks out(1us)
00000040 ; 0x20 << 1
0000000A
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000008 ; pulse, no meas
0000000A ; 0x5 << 1
00000001
0000000A ; width, 100ns ticks, 1us
00000000 
00000000
00000000 ; no meas flag
00000000 ; meas offset
00000000
00000000
00000004 ; patclk, 30 ticks out(3us)
00000040 ; 0x20 << 1
0000001e
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000006 ; pat_branch, 100 loops to tick 10 above
00000046 ; 0x23 << 1
0000000A ; 10 ticks, pat_addr of pulse opcode
00000000
00000064 ; 100 loops 
00000000
00000000 ; skip 0
00000000 ; stride 0
00000002 ; BIAS OFF 
0000000C ; 0x06 << 1
00000001
00000000
00000004 ; next, end pattern, patctl
00000044 ; 0x22 << 1 
00000010 ; PTN_END bit, d4
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000

00000000
